response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value that resonates with its high-quality craftsmanship and innovative features. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while securing a significant discount compared to the market rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your needs and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Let's embark on this journey together towards excellence.", "product_price": 950000}
